title: Public investment in Germany continues long-term downward trend (KfW Entwicklungsbank)
text: ( Source : KfW Entwicklungsbank ) Public investment fell again in the first half of the year Approved additional government expenditure gives reason to hope for tangible increases next year Refugee influx causes investment needs to rise
